prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with a bright green body and red accents.
Imagine a small creature that blends into forest environments, with unique spider-like features.
Show me a Pokemon that has a playful personality and uses webs to trap opponents.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and is known for its agility and stealth.
Generate a tiny insectoid Pokemon with vivid colors and distinctive mandibles.
Make a Pokemon that can climb trees and has a camouflage ability for surprise attacks.
Give me a Pokemon that evolves into a larger spider and has a mysterious aura.
